com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization

Class OAuthAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.restclientv2.authorization.DefaultRequestAuth
      • com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization.OAuthAuthorization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxRequestAuth

    public class OAuthAuthorization
extends DefaultRequestAuth
    This is authorization class for API requests using OAuth.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAuthAuthorization

        public OAuthAuthorization(OAuthDataController oAuth)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        oAuth - OAuth
        autoRefresh - Whether allow auto refresh the OAuth token when it's expired. Note you should only set this to true if you are making API calls in a single threaded fashion. Multiple threads trying to auto refresh at a same time will cause trouble. In that case you should implement your own logic to refresh synchronously.

        public void initOAuthForRequest()
